name: Langbase
title: langbase.com
payoff: Build and scale serverless AI agents
shortDescription: Langbase provides a platform for developers to create and deploy serverless AI agents efficiently. It is designed to enhance developer experience by allowing integration with over 250 language models through a unified API. Example use cases include building AI chatbots, anonymizers, and AI-driven summarizers for customer support tickets. The platform is trusted by top innovative organizations to accelerate AI product development.
